description: Comfort meets performance in this cozy, high-collared midlayer. Perfect for a range of winter sports and relaxed days outdoors, its Polartec® Thermal Pro® fleece fabric is soft and fast drying yet durable and resistant to pilling. With a lofted structure to effectively retain warmth, two zippered pockets, and flat seams for optimal comfort, this classic fleece jacket is a great addition to any outdoor kit.
name: Mammut Arctic ML Jacket - Mens
